sentence.Network_en: Many areas in the country'sinterior are unable to report Aids cases immediately.
sentence.Network_cn: 该国内地的很多地区无法即时报告艾滋病病例。

sentence.Network_en: Sex education is also expected to help check the spread of AIDS.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们还希望性教育有助于控制艾滋病的蔓延。

sentence.Network_en: We can now talk openly about AIDS which we couldn't before.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在我们能公开谈论以前讳言不提的艾滋病问题。

entry.tran: 艾滋病；获得性免疫缺陷综合征
entry.def: AIDS is a disease which destroys the natural system of protection that the body has against other diseases. AIDS is an abbreviation for (缩略=) 'acquired immune deficiency syndrome'.

means.word_mean: 1. a serious (often fatal) disease of the immune system transmitted through blood products especially by sexual contact or contaminated needles

sentences.en: Do you know what is AIDS?
sentences.cn: 你知道什么是艾滋病吗？

jushi.english: Recently many people have died of Aids.
jushi.chinese: 最近有不少人死于艾滋病。

jushi.english: Indeed, they say,Aids is spread primarily by carriers who are not ill.
jushi.chinese: 他们说艾滋病实际上最初是由健康人传播的。

jushi.english: In Britain,Aids tests are now performed on all people who offer to become blood donors.
jushi.chinese: 在英国,现在对所有献血的人都要进行艾滋病检验。
